column1: Appendix table 11: Number of sentenced prisoners admitted into and released from state or federal jurisdiction, by type, December 31, 2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Appendix table 11. Number of sentenced prisoners admitted into and released from state or federal jurisdiction, by type, December 31, 2009
Note: Totals based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. Totals exclude escapees, those absent without leave (AWOL), and transfers to and from other jurisdictions.
*New reporting systems prevent the disaggregation of admission and/or release type.
